items.description: The market may extend the downtrend if it breaks the 10-day EMA (Exponential Moving Average) amid likely consolidation, while the VIX in the lower zone supports bulls. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Advent’s rush to scale up Suven Pharma leads it to another acquisition
items.description: The NJ Bio acquisition follows Sapala Organics purchase in June

items.title: Ashok Leyland shares in focus on winning order worth Rs 345.58 crore
items.description: Ashok Leyland Share Price | During December 2024 - May 2025, the company is going to supply 1475 bus chassis at a total consideration of Rs 345.58 crore.

items.title: CRISIL shares likely to extend gain on fourth day on picking minority stake in Online PSB Loans
items.description: CRISIL Share Price | The board of directors of CRISIL has approved an investment in the equity capital of Online PSB Loans of an amount of Rs 33.25 crore, to acquire a 4.08 percent stake.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a weak start; US, Asian markets fall
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street pulled back on Thursday as investors evaluated key economic indicators ahead of the Federal Reserve's meeting next week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 234.44 points, or 0.53%, to 43,914.12, the S&P 500 lost 32.94 points, or 0.54%, to 6,051.25 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 132.05 points, or 0.66%, to 19,902.84.
